biotools.summary: GABOLA is an integrated solution of Genome de novo Assembly aimed at Precision Medicine and Genome Breeding. The core concept is to fill in both intra and inter-scaffold gaps mainly based on 10x Genomics linked reads. GABOLA is a highly-flexible tool, it can also be used with TGS Sequencing long reads and other Gap-Filling techniques.
